text: Gianmaria Dal Maistro (born 4 December 1980) is a visually impaired Italian male paralympic alpine skier who won medals at the Paralympic Games. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Paralympic alpine skiers of Italy Category:Paralympic gold medalists for Italy Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Italy Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Italy Category:Paralympic athletes of Fiamme Azzurre Category:Paralympic medalists in alpine skiing Category:Medalists at the 1998 Winter Paralympics Category:Alpine skiers at the 1998 Winter Paralympics
title: Gianmaria Dal Maistro
